qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.title: E2E suite has high failure rate in Chromium run
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.details: Baseline run had 24 failed, 9 passed, 1 skipped. On 2026-02-10, notifications/settings/teams/templates flows were stabilized and now pass in focused regression runs. Remaining failures are concentrated in agents, hub flow, and LLM generate/config tests.

fe-2026-02-10-a11y-color-contrast.title: Dashboard color contrast violations in navigation/header
fe-2026-02-10-a11y-color-contrast.details: Axe smoke test reports serious color-contrast failures (example ratio 2.77:1 vs required 4.5:1) across dashboard nav links and assistant header. Update token palette/styles to meet WCAG AA and keep a11y test green.

qa-2026-02-10-llm-test-mode-contract.title: Clarify LLM availability contract for E2E tests
qa-2026-02-10-llm-test-mode-contract.details: Service health reports lmstudio/ollama unreachable, while multiple LLM-related tests fail. Separate deterministic mock-based tests from live-LM tests and gate live tests behind explicit env flags with stable assertions.

qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.title: Redis vm.overcommit_memory host warning
qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.details: Redis and agents log vm.overcommit_memory=0 warning. Not blocking current run, but should be remediated on host (setup_host_services.ps1 or equivalent) to avoid instability under memory pressure.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-log-noise-404-endpoint.title: Reduce recurring 404 log noise in E2E runs
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-log-noise-404-endpoint.details: E2E logs repeatedly show expected-but-noisy 404s for /events?token=... and /stats/history during dashboard polling. Not blocking tests, but obscures real failures. Align frontend polling with available backend routes or implement explicit no-op handlers for test mode.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-bootstrap-performance.title: Avoid repeated pip install during every E2E run
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-bootstrap-performance.details: global-setup currently executes python -m pip install -r requirements.txt on each run unless ANANTA_SKIP_PIP=1. Add caching or smarter dependency checks to reduce startup latency and noise in local E2E cycles.

fe-2026-02-10-angular-build-warnings.title: Angular compile warnings in E2E web server output
fe-2026-02-10-angular-build-warnings.details: E2E runs emit non-blocking Angular warnings (NG8107 optional chaining, NG8113 unused RouterLink, and CommonJS warning for elkjs via mermaid). Cleaning these up will reduce log noise and improve build hygiene.
